column1: }}'''Lindissë''' was the first child and only daughter of [[Axantur]], a nobleman of [[Númenor]]. Her great-nephew [[Hallacar]] would marry [[Tar-Ancalimë]], the first [[Ruling Queen of Númenor]]. Almost nothing is known about her life.<ref>{{UT
Lindissë means "She of the Song" in [[Quenya]] (from ''[[lind]]-'' "a musical sound, song" and ''[[-issë]]'' = feminine ending). A better translation might be the female name "Melody".
